title: TILNET Conversation Knowledge Base
description: Claude conversations about building TILNET - recursive AI knowledge system

conversations.title: Claude Conversations
conversations.description: Complete conversation history including meta-conversations about system building

conversations.title: All Conversations
conversations.description: Raw conversation data with full-text search

tilnet_conversations.sql: SELECT name, created_at, length(chat_messages) as size FROM conversations WHERE name LIKE '%TIL%' OR chat_messages LIKE '%TILNET%' ORDER BY created_at DESC
tilnet_conversations.title: TILNET Development Conversations
tilnet_conversations.description: Conversations about building the TIL system

implementation_discussions.sql: SELECT name, created_at, length(chat_messages) as size FROM conversations WHERE chat_messages LIKE '%sqlite-utils%' OR chat_messages LIKE '%implementation%' ORDER BY created_at DESC
implementation_discussions.title: Implementation Discussions

search_conversations.sql: SELECT name, snippet(conversations_fts, 1, '<mark>', '</mark>', '...', 50) as snippet FROM conversations_fts JOIN conversations ON conversations.rowid = conversations_fts.rowid WHERE conversations_fts MATCH :search ORDER BY conversations.created_at DESC
search_conversations.title: Search Conversations
search_conversations.description: Full-text search across all conversation content
